column12: 2015 at the age of 19. the family will receive friends tuesday
column14: 2015 from 1:00 p. m. until 3:00 p. m. at shoal creek baptist church in holtville. funeral services are tuesday at 3:00 p. m. at shoal creek baptist church with rev. shane russell officiating and ashley miller eulogizing. interment will follow at coosa river cemetery. corey is survived by his parents

column31: and coach robbie broom. honorary pallbearers are the troy trojan football team and coaches along with the holtville high school football and soccer teams and coaches.
